name: donationRequest
lines: If you like using Salt and would like to give back in some way, [donations](https://donate.stripe.com/fZe5kv5SJ3jZfjG000) are most welcome!
There is also a link in the footer at the bottom of the page.

name: reviewRequest
lines: If you like using Salt please consider giving a rating on the [Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/salt/mjmcaioleoioplapgocohdkkcdlhlhci)!

name: profileTutorial
lines: With Salt, you can now use your profile page to choose a theme (e.g. dark mode) and specify friends' names so they appear at the top of the list of who's booked in for a meal!

name: mainPageTutorial
lines: If you're ever unsure about what something is or does, just hover over it and it will tell you (or contact me with the feedback link in the footer and I can redesign it to make it easier to understand).
